data.message: Holy fuck  Eminem fans are fucking annoying "Omg I love you Em" Or "Shady 15" Or better yet posting links to fan pages... Look I like  Eminem myself I've listened to him for well over 10 years but I honesty don't understand the big deal. He's not as good as some other rappers.

replies.message: He's actually better than most rappers
bitch these people are those who just can't seperate mediocrity and legends
If you don't like that comments, what are you doing here? 🙉

Dam you dont know shit about music...there for dont be judging it...hes obviously the best rapper out of all time...why not show love for someone whos inspired you in so many ways and Hes been here for us with his music

Definitely the best rapper, let's show it by signing this petition for him to come back to the UK for another tour!!!!!

Could be the last chance to see him live!!!

Sign and share!!!!

Let's get the word out!!!

 https://www.change.org/p/marshall-mathers-eminem-me-and-many-others-would-love-it-if-you-could-do-one-last-tour-in-the-uk-as-thousands-of-us-missed-your-two-night-stint-at-wembley-in-2014-we-just-want-one-last-chance-to-see-a-rap-legend-live-before-you-leave-the-game-for-goo?recruiter=350307000&utm_source=share_petition&utm_medium=copylink&rp_sharecordion_checklist=control
